        <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {
	var currentBDays = current.bookable_days + '';
	var previousBDays = previous.bookable_days + '';
	var currentBookableDays;
	var previousBookableDays;
	if (currentBDays.indexOf(',') > -1)
		currentBookableDays = currentBDays.split(",");
	else
		currentBookableDays = currentBDays.split("");
	
	if(previousBDays.indexOf(',') > -1)
		previousBookableDays = previousBDays.split(",");
	else
		previousBookableDays  = previousBDays.split("");
	
	var removedDays = [];
    for (var i = 0; i < previousBookableDays.length; i++) {
        if (currentBookableDays.indexOf(previousBookableDays[i]) < 0) { //Checking if any previous bookable days are removed.
            removedDays.push(previousBookableDays[i]);
        }
    }

	if(gs.nil(removedDays) || removedDays.length == 0)
		return;

	var aptUtil = new sn_apptmnt_booking.AppointmentBookingUtil();
	var appointmentsExists = aptUtil.hasAppointmentsOnGivenDays(current, removedDays, current.catalog_item, current.future_bookable_max_days);

	if (appointmentsExists) {
		current.setAbortAction(true);
		gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage("Active appointments found. Before updating the {0}, clear active appointments affected by the change.", "Bookable days"));
		gs.setRedirect(current);
	}	
	

})(current, previous);]]></script>
